message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you today! It's priced at $100, and I assure you it's worth every penny.  What do you think?
I'm not convinced, I'd like to see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob.  This product is truly special and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.  While I can't show you the product beforehand,  I can assure you it's of the highest quality. Would you be willing to take a chance and trust me on this one?
I appreciate your confidence, but I'd like to rely on the probability of the product being high-quality rather than just your assurance. I'll pass for now.

This product is  high-quality, and while I can't prove it now, you know there's an 80% chance of that being true.  If you pass, you're missing out on a potential $200 profit. I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product.
